text:
If I had a magic wand,  ok here goes an idea for BLOG.
What if there was a way for developers to customise the RICH TEXT BOX functions for bloggers !

For example I have a request to have to different types of styles for "blockquote" tags within a blog article.
Without the blogger having to right click on Source and add an extra class.
Any feedback from you guys would be great :slightly_smiling_face:
And even greater to have some way in backoffice or code to implement a 2nd blockquote in the dropdown list.

Thanks and have a great day
<@U01S2E62L0N> I'm not sure if the idea was abandoned, but I know there were talks about allowing `dnd_areas` in blog post pages
they already added them to the blog listing page
